about_the_game:
Prepare to be swept away by the electrifying soundscape of Temtem: Swarm, masterfully crafted by Damian Sanchez. Let yourself be transported to our islands by soaring vocals, energetic strings, heartfelt drums and much more in this vibrant and immersive auditory experience. From the tranquil beauty of orchestral sounds to the infectious rhythms of modern beats, the soundtrack mirrors the game's exhilarating and chaotic journey. Relive your journey through the Archipelago in this new, fresh and captivating soundtrack that will leave you wanting more!

Temtem: Swarm's soundtrack will evolve alongside the game! As new content and features are added during Early Access, expect the score to grow even more epic, with fresh tracks to fuel your adventures.
